name: 9th International Congress on Health Economics & Informatics
content: After a successful conference in 2020, Euroscicon is very delighted to invite you all to the â€œ9th International Congress on Health Economics & Informatics" (Health Economics 2020) scheduled on June 22-23, 2020 at Rome, Italy. We are progressively working for the initiation of new world, perspectives and views in the field of Global Health. Euroscicon is providing a great platform for thousands of Health Economics meet, learn, share and exchange views. We are concentrating on a view that everyone should gain from the conference. So, we are organizing plenary sessions, poster exhibitions and section programs, workshops at the conference.
